title: How to resend an email
description:
The record in the DB has to be updated to resend a mail: 

sippy=> UPDATE mails SET status = 1 where i_mail= <mail_id>;

,where <mail_id> is i_mail from the table mails of a mail that has to be resent.

The status of a mail can be:

1: mail is in a queue;

2: mail was sent successfully;

3: mail wasn't sent ( /var/log/ssp_maild.log has to be checked to find a reason).
